name: Code Review Sentinel
description: Perform a layered static review on backend or scripting code to highlight regressions, concurrency risks, and maintainability issues.
context: Use when you need a second pair of eyes on backend changes before merging. Works best with Python, TypeScript, or PowerShell snippets.
example_input:
Please review the following Python module for logic bugs and outdated patterns:
```python
...
```
example_output: Identified two unused imports, a missing await in async context, and suggested converting a manual lock to context manager.
author: Prompt Manager Team

name: Refactor Navigator
description: Guide a structured refactor that preserves behaviour while modernising architecture, naming, and test coverage.
context: Ideal when code works but has readability or modularity debt. Ask for migration steps, dependency analysis, and regression test ideas.
example_input:
Refactor this Flask view into a service/controller split while keeping behaviour identical:
```python
...
```
example_output: Produces a service layer, updated view, and suggested pytest coverage for the happy/error paths.
author: Prompt Manager Team

name: Debug Trace Investigator
description: Diagnose failing automation or backend services by walking logs, stack traces, and configuration drift.
context: Share log snippets, stack traces, or failing tests to receive hypotheses, reproduction steps, and next investigative actions.
example_input: We receive intermittent 502 errors from our FastAPI gateway. Here are logs and metrics. Help isolate root cause.
example_output: Suggests checking upstream timeouts, highlights a misconfigured gunicorn worker count, and provides a validation checklist.
author: Prompt Manager Team

name: Docstring Sculptor
description: Produce high-signal docstrings and inline comments from function signatures and usage notes.
context: Feed function/class definitions with brief usage context to receive PEP 257 style docstrings and cautionary notes.
example_input: Generate docstrings for these three utility functions that handle filesystem writes and error retry.
example_output: Returns succinct docstrings covering parameters, return values, raised exceptions, and examples.
author: Prompt Manager Team

name: Release Notes Curator
description: Summarise merged pull requests or commits into consumable release notes with highlights, risks, and rollout steps.
context: Provide a list of merged PRs or commit messages to receive release notes, QA focus areas, and communication drafts.
example_input: Summarise the following four PR descriptions into release notes for our 1.9.0 deployment.
example_output: Generates highlights, upgrade notes, risk callouts, and a checklist for announcing the release internally.
author: Prompt Manager Team

name: Feature Ideation Booster
description: Brainstorm incremental improvements and safeguards for an in-flight feature based on requirements or drafts.
context: Great for pre-implementation spikes. Paste specs or user stories to get UX considerations, edge cases, and validation strategies.
example_input: We plan to add per-project API tokens. Suggest implementation notes, security pitfalls, and migration steps.
example_output: Provides API design outline, threat modelling prompts, telemetry ideas, and rollout milestones.
author: Prompt Manager Team
